name: Blockchain (Jeff and Dom Make Games)
description:
A game about everyone's favorite (or least favorite) game mechanic: the parry. 

One button is all you need to get through this gauntlet. Block your opponent's attacks, and go for the longest combo. See how long you can make your B L O C K C H A I N.

And of course, if you get stuck just remember: NFT 

[N]ever
[F]orget
[T]o block

---

  • Hit effect from sinestesia
  • Background from @free-game-assets.itch.io
  • Many small effects from @pimen.itch.io 
  • Health bar shape from @adwitr.itch.io
